title: How powerful can a book be? - Quora

response.answer_text: A book is so powerful, that it should have a caution warning saying that this book could change your life, but the book is not the one that possess power alone, but it's your understanding the book and implementing it in your life, every book, every person in the world, know at least one thing you don't know about, so be sure to learn from everyone and everywhere where ever you can and implement the best thing you learn to be better than yesterday.

A book is sttong enough to change a person's attitude…It heals the pains of people by giving strength and hope..It awakes the pleasant soul in us..It's a collection of knowledge.. Thats why the famous proverb “A good Friend is equal to thousands of books”..
